name: Electro Whopperflower
description:
Energetic mimetic Plant monsters that use Electro to attack their prey.
When fully-charged with Electro energy, they can unleash a strong electric current from their crowns. As such, some researchers have tried to apply them in other areas...

investigation.name: Whopperflower
investigation.description: A bizarre mimetic plant monster that harnesses the elements in combat.\nThese plants lurk under the surface and ambush unsuspecting prey. With the passage of years, sufficient nutrition, and the right environment, it could even take root somewhere and grow into a giant tree that sways and spews elemental power...
